vote.title: Authorize a two-year construction services contract with three one-year renewal options to perform job order contracting services at City of Dallas facilities with METCO Engineering dba METCO, Brown & Root Industrial Services LLC, RS Commercial Construction, LLC, 3i Contracting LLC, Phoenix I Restoration and Construction, Ltd., and Big Sky Construction Co. Inc., the most advantageous proposers of twenty seven - Not to exceed $25,000,000.00 - Financing: Capital Construction Fund (subject to annual appropriations) (see Fiscal Information)
